author: Michelle Ghoussoub
title: Feeling helpless in the wake of COVID-19? Here are 6 things you can do
description: Social distancing doesn't mean we can't help each other out.
content:
As news around COVID-19 continues to evolve at a rapid fire pace and and uncertainty looms over seemingly everything, it's easy to feel overwhelmed.
Canadians are being urged to practise social distancing by staying home as much as possible and maintaining t… [+4647 chars]
